title: What can be inferred about Xining

content.question: What can be inferred from the e-mail about the city of Xining?

choices.label: It has, or once had, a Muslim community.
It is surrounded by a body of water.
Its altitude is higher than that of Lhasa (Lasa).
It cannot be reached by train.

content.answer: It has, or once had, a Muslim community.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
